name: Train to Summer's End
description:
It's the end of summer. You feel like going somewhere, but not actually arrive anywhere. You are tired but feel nice. You are waiting for whatever will come. You can feel it pleasantly in the air. You are not worried.
You watch a train go round in circles.

_____________________________

I know this is not how real trains behave. I made the game nonetheless.

______________________________

Controls:

Space to accelerate train

Scroll mouse to zoom in/out

_______________________________

Design + Code by Iris Anstey

Music + Sounds by Paul Anstey

Train Model: by IL.ranch

_____________________________

For smoother experience without choppy shadows feel free to download.
